text:
Love how they focus on local teas that don’t burn your wallet. Most of the drinks range from a dollar to two.

Got my usual teh c kosong. While the teh taste doesn’t come off strongly in the first few mouths, it comes through slowly with each sip. Teh is served piping hot, which I appreciate. Would definitely be back whenever I have the chance!

I really enjoy coming here to have a few daily cups of tea to then sit and people watch.  They have a great selection of drinks and their prices are so cheap.The staff are so friendly and always smiling so I highly recommend coming here.

The staffs are amazing. I always order ginger tea because they have the best flavour and price. They are not only quick in making great coffees and teas, but they know each and everyone of us by heart
Staff are friendly and humorous. I got my order wrong online at Somerset outlet but they still carry on with my request and did their best to accommodate with my coffee. Very kind team.
Crews are very efficient and friendly. Beverages tastes better than those from other outlets. My daily energy booster with every sip of Iced Almond Milk Coffee in the morning.
